pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 2 by SSCI

content.raw: Hmm, I’m realizing most of what I said was valid, but that I was actually describing our x2 config 8 vehicle above.  So, the major difference on this configuration is the use of a 3d lidar with less range that is less expensive than the 300 m lidar.
content.html: Hmm, I’m realizing most of what I said was valid, but that I was actually describing our x2 config 8 vehicle above. So, the major difference on this configuration is the use of a 3d lidar with less range that is less expensive than the 300 m lidar.
